summary.span: 指定用于调用方法的 HTTP 谓词以及响应的格式。

span.span: Specifies which HTTP verb is used to invoke a method, and the format of the response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于指定可以从客户端脚本调用的方法的信息。This attribute is used to specify information for methods that can be called from client script. 该属性允许您指定的 HTTP 谓词 （GET 或 POST） 可用于调用的方法。The attribute lets you specify which HTTP verb (GET or POST) can be used to invoke a method. 它还允许你指定的响应是否通过使用 JavaScript 对象表示法 (JSON) 或 XML 格式。It also lets you specify whether the response is formatted by using either JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) or XML. 属性是可选项。The attribute is optional. (但是，可以从客户端脚本调用的方法必须具有应用属性。)。(However, methods that can be called from client script must have the attribute applied.). 如果方法未标有、 将使用 HTTP POST 命令调用方法和响应将序列化为 JSON。If a method is not marked with , the method will be called by using the HTTP POST command and the response will be serialized as JSON. 不能覆盖此设置从脚本。You cannot override this setting from script. 只采用命名参数。 takes only named parameters. 以下是属性的可用作命名参数的类：The following are the properties of the class that can be used as named parameters: - 指定是否将使用 HTTP GET 命令调用该方法。Specifies whether the method will be invoked by using the HTTP GET command. 默认值为 `false`。The default is `false`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 设置属性设置为`true`可能带来安全风险的应用程序，如果你正在使用敏感数据或事务。Setting the property to `true` might pose a security risk for your application if you are working with sensitive data or transactions. 在 GET 请求，该消息由浏览器编码为 URL，因此更容易遭到篡改。In GET requests, the message is encoded by the browser into the URL and is therefore an easier target for tampering. 对于 GET 和 POST 请求，应遵循安全指导原则来保护敏感数据。For both GET and POST requests, you should follow security guidelines to protect sensitive data. - 指定是否将响应序列化为 JSON 或者 XML。Specifies whether the response will be serialized as JSON or as XML. 默认值为 `Json`。The default is `Json`. 属性可用于指定 XML 作为返回类型，该方法返回时或对象。The property is useful to specify XML as the return type when the method returns an or an object. - 指定是否将所有返回类型，包括字符串类型序列化为 XML。Specifies whether all return types, including string types, are serialized as XML. 值响应序列化为 JSON 时，将忽略属性。The value of the property is ignored when the response is serialized as JSON. 有关如何使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about how to use attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何应用到`GetXmlDocument`和`EchoStringAndDate`方法，以指定要使用并指定响应格式的 HTTP 谓词。The following example shows how to apply to the `GetXmlDocument` and `EchoStringAndDate` methods to specify which HTTP verb to use and to specify the response format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法重写中 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 客户端上的此属性。You cannot override this property from ECMAScript (JavaScript) on the client. 如果此属性设置为`true`，从脚本调用方法将始终使用 HTTP GET。If this property is set to `true`, invoking the method from script will always use HTTP GET. 当此属性设置为`true`，客户端代理代码使用 HTTP GET 来调用 Web 服务。When this property is set to `true`, the client proxy code uses HTTP GET to call the Web service. 方法的每个输入的参数显示为用于调用 Web 方法的 URL 中的查询参数。Each input parameter for the method appears as a query parameter in the URL that is used to invoke the Web method. 通过 JavaScript 对象表示法 (JSON) 序列化和 URL 编码的参数值获取参数值。The parameter value is obtained through JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) serialization and URL encoding of the parameter value. 用于调用 Web 服务方法的 HTTP GET 使用遵循任何其他 Web 交互的相同准则。The use of HTTP GET for invoking the Web service method follows the same guidelines for any other Web interaction. 应仅对操作使用 HTTP GET，其中公开任何敏感数据和服务器操作没有负面影响时。HTTP GET should be used only for operations where no sensitive data is exposed and when the server action does not have side effects. > [!IMPORTANT] > 设置属性设置为`true`可能带来安全风险的应用程序，如果你正在使用敏感数据或事务。Setting the property to `true` might pose a security risk for your application if you are working with sensitive data or transactions. 在 GET 请求，该消息由浏览器编码为 URL，因此更容易遭到篡改。In GET requests, the message is encoded by the browser into the URL and is therefore an easier target for tampering. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何应用于具有的 Web 方法属性设置为`true`。The following example shows how to apply to a Web method with the property set to `true`. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
